pageProduct.name: Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo's pH balanced formula is specially designed to soothe flaking scalp and restore and maintain healthy clean hair and scalp. Leaving your scalp feeling healthy and rejuvenated and hair silky clean!

What is Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo for?Specially formulated to reduce flaking of the scalp through a gentle moisturising and exfoliating process. Formulated with Aloe Vera and Birch Extract, Redwin Coal Tar shampoo soothes and moisturises dry and itchy scalps, removes flaking scalp and restores and maintains healthy clean hair and scalp. pH balanced.Who is Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo for?Anyone with a dry or itchy scalp.When should I use Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo?Use if you have a history of dry, itchy scalp, dandruff, or other scalp conditions. Use once or twice weekly, or as recommended by your pharmacist.Why should I use Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo?Redwin Coal Tar Shampoo helps ensure healthy hair and scalp. Dry/itchy scalp is moisturised and itchiness soothed. Flaking is reduced.

Suitable For: Anyone suffering from a flaking, itchy or dry scalp.

Size: 250mL

Serving Size: n/a

Warnings

n/a

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, TEA-Lauryl Sulfate, Cocamide DEA,Sodium Chloride, Sodium Salicylate, Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis) Leaf Extract, Birch (Betula ALba) Extract, Citric Acid, Tetra Sodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylsothiazolinone, Fragrance (parfum), CI 20285, CI42090, CI19140.

Contains: Aloe Vera

Allergen Contains: Null

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Wet hair. Apply enough Redwin Coal Tar shampoo to produce a lather while massaging into the hair and scalp. Rinse. Use once or twice weekly, or as recommended by your pharmacists.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C
